lead_paragraph: Fethullah Gulen, accused by President Recep Tayyip Erdogan of inspiring an effort to overthrow the Turkish government, compared Mr. Erdogan’s government to that of Nazi-era Germany.

headline.print_headline: Exiled Cleric Denies Leading Coup Effort
headline.main: An Exiled Cleric Denies Playing a Leading Role in Coup Attempt

snippet: Fethullah Gulen, accused by President Recep Tayyip Erdogan of inspiring an effort to overthrow the Turkish government, compared Mr. Erdogan’s government to that of Nazi-era Germany....
abstract: Turkish cleric Fethullah Gulen, who has personally exiled himself to United States. speaks out against coup attempt in Turkey, while criticizing Pres Recep Tayyip's administration.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
